text: ai logon! apane rab ka dar rakhon, jisane tumako ek jeev se paida kiya aur usee jaati ka usake lie joda paida kiya aur un donon se bahut-se purush aur striyaan phaila dee. allaah ka dar rakho, jisaka vaasta dekar tum ek-doosare ke saamane maangen rakhate ho. aur naate-rishton ka bhee tumhen khayaal rakhana hain. nishchay hee allaah tumhaaree nigaraanee kar raha hain
